name: csc225-lab-outage
description: Faculty explain how to keep working while the physical lab machines are offline.

events.content: Anyone else getting kicked out of the 225 lab machines? Need to finish the bitwise lab tonight.
Yep, whole lab went down after a power blip.
Do we just wait it out?
SSH into unix.csc.calpoly.edu with your Cal Poly credentials. It has the same toolchain. Save everything under ~/csc225 and push with git as usual. Physical lab reopens at 8 a.m. tomorrow.
Bless. Remote login workedâ€”back on track.
